message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but not 50/50. You can't have all the fun!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still want a bit more for myself. You can't have all the fun, but I'll share a bit more!
I'm not giving up! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not going to get taken advantage of. You're going to have to do better than that!
I'm willing to take a risk and go big! I think I deserve more, and I'm willing to take it. You can't let me get away with this!
You're getting bold, but I'm not going to let you take it all! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not going to get taken advantage of. This is my final offer!
